metadata.title: CVE-2024-5691 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: By tricking the browser with a `X-Frame-Options` header, a sandboxed iframecould have presented a button that, if clicked by a user, would bypassrestrictions to open a new window. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
